refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Scales incoming value to user-definable range. Similar to scale object found in popular dataflow languages.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: kscl scale kinput, kmax, kmin[, kimax, kimin]

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kin -- Input value. Can originate from any k-rate source as long as that source's output is in range kimin to kimax.
kmin -- Minimum value of the resultant scale operation.
kmax -- Maximum value of the resultant scale operation.
kimin -- Optional; Minimum of the incoming value range, defaulting to zero.
kimax -- Optional; Maximum of the incoming value range, defaulting to one.

para.warning: Take care with the order of the arguments which has maximum before minimum
